mapper.insert: insert into dongtu_emp ( emp_name, joindate, salary, height, dept_id) values(#{empName}, #{joindate}, #{salary}, #{height}, #{deptId})
mapper.update: update dongtu_emp set emp_name = #{empName} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dongtu_emp emp, dongtu_dept dep where emp.dept_id = dep.dept_id;
